analysis_summary.difficulty_rationale: The system architecture was redesigned to support scalability and multi-tenancy, and an event-driven pipeline using Kafka was introduced. These are significant architectural changes indicating a higher level of difficulty.
kudos_evidence: ethan-arch shared code -> acknowledged by bob-backend in Slack: Perfect, thanks! I’ll adapt this and commit.
penalty_evidence: Meeting M2: charlie-frontend: That’s not ready yet. I underestimated the effort.
Meeting M2: ethan-arch: The client specifically asked for role-based views this sprint. charlie-frontend: I know. I missed the timeline.
Meeting M3: alice-dev: I didn’t ask questions early and assumed things. That caused confusion.
Meeting M3: charlie-frontend: I underestimated complexity and stayed quiet about delays.
Meeting M3: ethan-arch: Both of those caused real issues, wrong assumptions and missed deadlines.
